title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Dornier Do 31 - using the VTOL functionality
description:
In this video we are going to look at how to use the vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) functionality of the Dornier Do 31. First we will look at how to setup your controls and after that we go through the setup of the functionality first using the hover mode and after that the STOVL mode.

00:00 intro
00:10 setting up the controls
02:44 VTOL - hover mode
07:46 VTOL - STOVL mode
